content: size 5 1/2 14 cm diameter material pearl cotton # 8 hook 1 25 mm bates steel #9 color white you can substitute with cebelia #20 or equivalent cordonnet thread but the gauge can slightly vary you may want to give a look to my virtual store if you need materials stitches - chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet treble - dcl 3-double_crochet cluster = 3 double_crochet crocheted and closed together in same lp - shell = dcl 2 chain dcl in same space - vs = v_stitch = double_crochet 2 chain double_crochet on next st difficulty medium
